name: SalesLoft
description: Integrate with SalesLoft to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List People
tools.description: List people (contacts) from SalesLoft with optional filtering by email, updated date, or cadence membership.

tools.name: Create Person
tools.description: Create a new person in SalesLoft. Provide at least an email address.

tools.name: List Cadences
tools.description: List cadences from SalesLoft. Returns cadence names, types, and people counts.

tools.name: Add To Cadence
tools.description: Add a person to a SalesLoft cadence. Creates a cadence membership linking the person to the cadence.

tools.name: List Activities
tools.description: List activities (emails, calls, etc.) from SalesLoft. Filter by type, person, or date range.
